title: Q-Boson Representation of the Quantum Matrix Algebra $M_q(3)$
abstract: {Although q-oscillators have been used extensively for realization of quantum universal enveloping algebras,such realization do not exist for quantum matrix algebras ( deformation of the algebra of functions on the group ). In this paper we first construct an infinite dimensional representation of the quantum matrix algebra $ M_q ( 3 ) $(the coordinate ring of $ GL_q (3)) $ and then use this representation to realize $ GL_q ( 3 ) $ by q-bosons.}
